name: Leg Locked Restraint
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] salta ágilmente en el aire con un volteo y aterriza hábilmente la entrepierna en la cara de [TargetName], haciendo que [TargetHimOrHer] pierda el equilibrio [TargetHisOrHer] y comience a caer, pero antes de golpear el suelo, [AttackerName]Gira para aterrizar de forma segura en la parte trasera de [AttackerName] Cushy como [AttackerHeOrShe] TRAPS [TargetName] en la cabeza en un poderoso bloqueo de piernas.
statusMiss: [AttackerName] nimbly leaps into the air with a flip and angles directly towards [TargetName], but [TargetHeOrShe] manages to sidestep [AttackerHisOrHer] aerial strike as [AttackerName] gracefully lands on the ground!
restraintEscaped: And manages to get free of [AttackerName]'s crushing thighs!
restraintEscapedFail: But [TargetName] can't get free of [AttackerName]'s crushing thighs!
